seed_pair.target: Because I think that it's a good thing to make mistakes.
seed_pair.known: Porque pienso que es una cosa buena hacer errores.

S0042: estaba comenzando a sentirme mejor | comenzando a sentirme | sentirme mejor | mejor que anoche | anoche
I was starting to feel better | starting to feel | feel better | better than last night | last night
S0043: no estaba pensando | pensando en cómo responder | en cómo responder | cómo responder | responder
I wasn't thinking | thinking about how to answer | about how to answer | how to answer | to answer
S0044: o | si necesito mejorar | necesito mejorar | mejorar
or | if I need to improve | I need to improve | to improve
S0045: no necesito saber | necesito saber | saber todo | saber | todo
I don't need to know | I need to know | know everything | to know | everything
S0046: pero | no me preocupo por hacer errores | me preocupo por | por hacer errores | hacer errores | errores
but | I don't worry about making mistakes | I worry about | about making mistakes | make mistakes | mistakes
